introduction: The datasets listed here are public collections within the Open Terms Archive federated ecosystem. Their quality depends on their maintainers, and can vary greatly from collections curated by full-time academic research teams to on-and-off volunteers. Please make sure to read the license and maintenance commitment of each collection before publishing work based on these datasets.
related_datasets.title: Third-party related datasets
related_datasets.introduction: The datasets below are independent from Open Terms Archive and are listed for researchersâ€™ convenience. If you know of other relevant datasets, please add them.
